28.heading: Lesbian Conferences.

28.appears_in: p. 74-75 in Dykes to Watch Out for : the Sequel (Ithaca, N.Y. : Firebrand Books, 1992)
notes: Summary: Ginger has indulged in flirtatious behavior at the national lesbian conference, and says it's nothing; then Malika sends her roses. The cigar-smoking, anchor-tatooed delivery man says, "A Ginger Jordan live here, Sonny?" To which Lois replies, "Yes, she does! Thank you kindly, Ma'm!"
